alert.note: Alert for Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:19AM CDT until May 24 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ORLEANS...SOUTHEASTERN ST. TAMMANY PARISHES IN SOUTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND SOUTHWESTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 119 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pearlington, or 7 miles east of Slidell, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Lake Catherine and Pearlington. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 269 and 273. Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 9. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
